t: Bravo Sierra Launches Prestige Range, Announces New Funding
s: October 8, 2024 - Military-themed personal care brand Bravo Sierra, which targeted the mass market when it debuted in 2019, is relaunching with a line of prestige hair and skin products designed for high-performance lifestyles. Its existing mass line will be sold exclusively at Amazon.
